name: @edsilv/aframe
description: An experiment to see if it's possible to update A-Frame to use webpack, esmodules, types (via TypeScript), and custom elements v1.

scripts.clean: rimraf -rf dist-umd dist-commonjs dist-esmodule dist-var types docs
scripts.build:docs: rimraf -rf docs && typedoc --out docs --name AFRAME --theme default --ignoreCompilerErrors --experimentalDecorators --emitDecoratorMetadata --target ES6 --moduleResolution node --preserveConstEnums --stripInternal --suppressExcessPropertyErrors --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --module commonjs src/ && echo> docs/.nojekyll
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run clean && npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:esmodule && npm run build:umd && npm run build:var && npm run build:types && npm run build:docs

author: @edsilv
